byline.contributor: Benjamin Mueller and John Surico contributed reporting.
byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and AL BAKER

abstract: New York City Police announce arrest of one person connected to botched robbery of luxury watch retailer at Roosevelt Field Mall in Garden City, Long Island, which left male mall employee wounded.
lead_paragraph: One person was taken into custody, and the worker was taken to a hospital. The police said businesses at the Long Island mall had resumed normal operations.

headline.main: Worker Shot at Roosevelt Field Mall During Robbery
headline.print_headline: Worker Shot at Busy Mall in a Robbery of a Retailer

snippet: One person was taken into custody, and the worker was taken to a hospital. The police said businesses at the Long Island mall had resumed normal operations.
